sentences.en: " What? " The Master of Sorcere brandished his sausage. " This travesty. This abomination. "
sentences.cn: “ 怎么了? ” 术士学院的导师挥舞着手中的香肠. “ 我说的是这个烂东西. 这个恶心的玩意. ”

sentences.en: Abner said solemnly , " all heathen idols are an abomination to the Lord. "
sentences.cn: 艾布纳沉着脸说, “ 一切异教的偶像全是对主的亵渎. ”

sentences.en: Abomination! Vile creatures! You will fall before Mab.
sentences.cn: 可憎的家伙! 卑鄙的生物! 你必定会先于马伯而死.

sentences.en: All I behold is an abomination.
sentences.cn: 我所看到的只有憎恨而已.

sentences.en: For some, the question is an abomination.
sentences.cn: 对一些人来说, 这个问题很可憎.

sentences.en: His treatment of the children is an abomination.
sentences.cn: 他以憎恨的态度来对待孩子.

sentences.en: Mark my words -- I shall revenge this abomination!
sentences.cn: 留意我的话 —— 我会报复这件令人讨厌的事的.

sentences.en: My rogues scouts have just reported an abomination in the Monastery graveyard!
sentences.cn: 我的萝格斥候刚刚回报,在僧院的埋骨之地中发生了令人痛恨的事情!

sentences.en: Reduced the damage dealt by the Sul'lithuz Abomination and Sul'lithuz Sandcrawler.
sentences.cn: 减少了苏萨斯憎恨者和苏萨斯沙行者的伤害.

sentences.en: That new concrete building is an abomination.
sentences.cn: 那座新的混凝土建筑物是个讨厌的东西.

sentences.en: Their abomination of violence was obvious.
sentences.cn: 他们对暴力行为的痛恨是很明显的.

sentences.en: Then shall I make the rest of it into an abomination?
sentences.cn: 这剩下的,我岂要作成可憎的物 么 ?

sentences.en: What is happening is an abomination.
sentences.cn: 正在发生的事令人非常反感。

words.tran_cn: 厌恶；憎恨；令人厌恶的事物

trans.tran_cn: 嫌恶，深恶痛绝，令人憎恶的人或事物，可憎恶的或卑劣的习惯或行为
trans.tran_en: someone or something that is extremely offensive or unacceptable
